title: Ticket #2656: Add condor_q -grid
description:
Condor_q -globus provides a customized view of gram jobs and their gram-specific attributes. An equivalent -grid option that works similarly for all grid universe jobs would be very useful.

The job attributes we want to display are ClusterId/ProcId, Owner, GridJobStatus, and GridResource/GridJobId. All of this information can easily overflow 80 columns for some grid job types. The GridResource/GridJobId values can be abbreviated to fit better, but how to do so will vary by grid-type. We could start off with a default of print GridJobId if present, else print GridResource, truncating at 79/80 columns. Then we add special cases for the common grid-types that present a condensed version.

Here are sample values for some grid-types:

  • gt5 
    GridResource = "gt5 stress2.chtc.wisc.edu/jobmanager-condor"
GridJobId = "gt5 stress2.chtc.wisc.edu/jobmanager-condor https://stress2.chtc.wisc.edu:40420/16217818952655053191/8230609966348680834/"
GridJobStatus = "ACTIVE"
GridJobStatus = "PENDING"

  • cream 
    GridResource = "cream https://stress3.chtc.wisc.edu:8443/ce-cream/services/CREAM2 condor stress3.chtc.wisc.edu"
GridJobId = "cream https://stress3.chtc.wisc.edu:8443/ce-cream/services/CREAM2 CREAM885512373"
GridJobStatus = "IDLE"
GridJobStatus = "RUNNING"
GridJobStatus = "REALLY-RUNNING"
GridJobStatus = "DONE-OK"
GridJobStatus = "PENDING"

  • nordugrid 
    GridResource = "nordugrid ametisti.grid.helsinki.fi"
GridJobId = "nordugrid ametisti.grid.helsinki.fi 2014713323503731835164308"
GridJobStatus = "PREPARED"
GridJobStatus = "SUBMITTING"
GridJobStatus = "INLRMS: R"
GridJobStatus = "INLRMS: Q"
GridJobStatus = "EXECUTED"
GridJobStatus = "FINISHED"

  • condor 
    GridResource = "condor submit-1.chtc.wisc.edu cm.chtc.wisc.edu"
GridJobId = "condor submit-1.chtc.wisc.edu cm.chtc.wisc.edu 9.0"
GridJobStatus = "IDLE"
GridJobStatus = "RUNNING"

  • pbs 
    GridResource = "pbs e016.chtc.wisc.edu"
GridJobId = "pbs pbs/20120321/36.e016.chtc.wisc.edu"
GridJobStatus = "RUNNING"
remarks:
2012-Jun-05 17:16:03 by dweitzel:
For PBS, can we have a GridJobStatus = "IDLE" ? I only see it when it's "RUNNING".

2012-Jun-06 15:12:43 by tstclair:
Why not do a constraint query, the reason I ask is your question opens another 

question: "Why not support condor_q -any_universe"
answer: condor_q -constraint.

P.S. - There is also EC2 and deltacloud if you wish to support -grid

But it may be a matter of convenience too.

2012-Jul-09 15:06:37 by dweitzel:
I would like PBS to be consistent with the other batch grid interfaces.

2012-Dec-18 17:05:05 by tlmiller:
There isn't a 'manager' for EC2, and most of the host names will be the same (e.g., ec2.amazonaws.com) Instead, why don't we display 'ec2 <vm name>' in the 'resource->manager host' column, where <vm name> is ATTR_EC2_REMOTE_VM_NAME? 

GridResource = "ec2 https://ec2.amazonaws.com/"
GridResource = "ec2 https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com"
GridResource = "ec2 https://ec2.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"
GridResource = "ec2 euca3://euca3.bro.example.domain"
GridResource = "ec2 x509://fermilab.custom.hack"

2013-May-21 17:20:26 by johnkn:
while there is certainly more room for improvement in condor_q -grid output and options, the basic work is complete and no more improvements will happen in the 7.9 series, so I'm resolving this ticket -tj
check_ins:
2012-Dec-18 17:04   Check-in [34431]: (#2656) Make output of -run and -grid less useless for EC2. (By Todd L Miller )
2012-Jun-27 11:19   Check-in [32486]: documented 7.9.0 feature: -autoformat option in condor_q and condor_status ===GT=== #2941 ===GT=== #2656 (By Karen Miller )
2012-Apr-04 13:58   Check-in [31112]: add support for condor_q -grid #2656, this involves improvements to class-ad pretty printer so that it both custom and printf formatting can be used on a single column. the pretty printer code keeps track of column widths, and can print headings with width to match the column data. ===VersionHistory:Pending=== [...] (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: jfrey
